Html:
I'd like to work with the Instant Search in Outlook.  What I'm trying to achieve is to add additional search results to Instant Search's results which come from a different service (e.g. a webservice).

Is it possible to work with Instant Search using NetOffice?

hello sprocketonline,

Of course you can use instant search with NetOffice.  the API includes all features of outlook.
This article is an excerpt from the book "Programming Applications for Microsoft Office Outlook 2007"

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc513841(v=office.12).aspx

a very good tutorial i find, the example code is 100% compatible with NetOffice all the time.

Good Luck !!!
*Sebastian
